I am trying to write some unit tests for a Struts Action that uses 
JavaMail to send a message. It seems to do this I'll need to 

1 - Use a junit extension built for Struts
2 - Use IOC to substitute a mock JavaMail implementation for the 
real thing.

I have found StrutsTestCase (http://strutstestcase.sourceforge.net/) 
as a framework for doing #1, but it does not seem to allow me to do 
#2. I could do #2 without #1 by refactoring into a helper class, but 
that would leave the action untested.

Do anyone have any ideas how to do both #1 and #2?

Thanks
Alex
